nav.doubletap: Push back twice to exit app

btn.openmaps: go here with external maps app

email.appnotfound: Could not find an email app, please send an email to:
email.subject: Question / feedback 75 years of freedom app
email.body: Hi, I have some feedback or a question about the 75 years of freedom app

location.nolocation: Location could not be retrieved (does app have location access?)
location.error: Error getting location (heeft de app toestemming?)

map.noappfound: No maps app found to plan route with

share.point: I found an interesting point with this app!
share.route: I found an interesting route with this app!
share.how: How do you want to share this?

config.crashInfo: Enable collecting crash information (helps us fix bugs!)
config.analyticsInfo: Enable collecting analytics (no personal info is stored)
config.downloadAll: Download all files & routes (not necessary, but convenient when you have limited or no mobile internet)
config.help: Here you can toggle settings, and download routes to your phone.
config.screenon: Keep the screen display on when using map.

message.englishNotYetSupportedMessage: Our apologies, only parts of the app are translated. We are working on a better support for English. Please reach out to us if you'd like a translation in a different language.
message.loadingTroubleInitial: There is a problem retrieving data, mayber the connection is slow, please wait...
message.loadingTrouble: There is a problem retrieving data, is wifi or mobile data enabled?
message.loadingTroubleFinal: There is a problem retrieving data, our apologies. Maybe completely closing the app and restarting will help.

ios.info.plist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Find your current location to see interesting points nearby.
ios.info.plist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Find your current location to see interesting points nearby.
